history.content:
I'm a current Berkeley senior applying to Masters programs. I see on the Grad Admission site that "Applicants may only apply to one single degree program or one concurrent degree program per admission term." I'm interested in the following categories of programs, with different admission terms:

$$ \\ $$
(1) Summer 2021 — Information & Data Science 5th-Year MIDS
(2) Fall 2021 — EECS MEng
$$ \\ $$
Since these span 2 different admission terms, can I apply to both? If so, how do I go about submitting multiple applications through the Graduate Admissions Website? The dropdown only lets me choose one application.
$$ \\ $$
I emailed the Grad Admissions staff, but their office is closed until January 5th, so thought I'd ask here. Thanks!
history.subject: How to apply to both MIDS and MEng?
